headline.main: Rescue Helicopter Crashes in Central Japan; At Least 3 Dead
headline.print_headline: Rescue Helicopter Crashes in Central Japan; At Least 3 Dead

lead_paragraph: A rescue helicopter carrying nine people crashed in snow-covered mountains in central Japan during a training flight Sunday, leaving at least three people dead and four missing.
snippet: A rescue helicopter carrying nine people crashed in snow-covered mountains in central Japan during a training flight Sunday, leaving at least three people dead and four missing....
